```{r readdata}
dataIE <- read_excel("Data analysis and Computer programming in Industrial Engineering_survey.xlsx")
```

## General responses



```{r coop, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(dataIE) + geom_bar(aes(x=Coop)) + xlab("Coop or internship") + ylab("Number of responses") + ggtitle("Did you have a Coop or internship")
```

```{r Minor, echo=FALSE}
dataIE <- within(dataIE, 
                   Minor <- factor(Minor, 
                                      levels=names(sort(table(Minor), 
                                                        decreasing=TRUE))))
ggplot(dataIE,aes(x=Minor)) + geom_bar() + xlab("Field") + ylab("Number of responses") + 
  ggtitle("Did you have a double major, minor, or concentration") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))
```

```{r Analyzedata, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(dataIE) + geom_bar(aes(x=AnalyzeData)) + xlab("Analyze Data") + ylab("Number of responses") + ggtitle("Outside of class, did you have to analyze data") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))
```

```{r ComputerProgramming, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(dataIE) + geom_bar(aes(x=ComputerProgramming)) + xlab("Programming") + ylab("Number of responses") + ggtitle("Outside of class, did you have to program") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))
```

